lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we've missed you, we're happy to be back, and before we get into tonight's session, we have some announcements to go through, so we'll go ahead and jump in with our first of two sponsors tonight: Skillshare. Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who woulda thought a 50 year old man-baby would be the toast of this town? A couple of months ago, I couldn't even get an audition

lines.name: NCIS
lines.text: Note: Reach out to Keanu to do a remake of A Walk to Remember called Ewok to Remember.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why does it look like you shoved your face in an airplane toilet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they were colorblind. Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Baby Yoda out! Back to you, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy to have you back in all of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was my least favorite ad you've ever done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really? I felt like a few have been worse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, I can definitely think of worse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who doesn't love Baby Fucking Yoda?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do need a stogie. Next time, next time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is straight out of "Who Framed Roger Rabbit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, don't say there's a next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our second sponsor tonight are our returning friends for the entirety of campaign two, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and check them out at dndbeyond.link/criticalrole, and thank you guys for supporting our show, really appreciate it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, with that, let's ring in 2020.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (like Baby Fucking Yoda) Oh! Oh! (water bubbling) (explosion booming) ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Mighty Nein, Mighty Nein ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands, ♪ ♪ take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn, your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was more the volume I think that got me, more than the content.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's about quantity, guys, not quality.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You decided in your break time to make some purchases, make some orders, get a bone flute, (laughter) order a bone harp, order a jeweled chalice, and get involved in some underground fighting, in which you put some money down, Beauregard beat up an older gentleman--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two paladins went head-to-head, and it did not end in Fjord's favor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Yasha worked through some physical therapy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there any business you want to deal with when you return to the Camarouth Cottage, or do you want to move on to the morning?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to fall asleep, and just lick my wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys all head to your respective rooms.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought saliva was, like, quite clean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, isn't it, like, sterile? Isn't that what they say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, if you can pee on them, I don't know, it might be difficult, but.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless you have a dog to pee on them? Or wait, no, a dog to lick them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dog pee is not sanitary, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But a dog saliva? Nevermind, we're over-complicating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can use people pee, too, for that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a whole jaw system that's underneath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't studied much marine life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I'm back. What is this? What's going on? I've missed something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the anatomy of a jellyfish.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, they lift it up and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, those who are messes clean yourselves up a bit and head to your-- (disappointed sigh) head to your rooms for the night to rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stretch that out for us? That's the existential dread I'm here for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still doing this! You're still doing this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in the rotation, I can't change the history.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you just have a box, a closet, of Mercer shirts?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have four drawers of t-shirts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not all Matt, some are me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But for the majority of you to eat for the morning, it's not too bad, I'd say, I'd put you at about four or five silver for everyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you do fasted cardio in the morning? Or is it, like, eat and then work out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no, fasted cardio, absolutely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were working out before this? You skipped a day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just make sure you let me know, because--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While you still have dragon breath?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe I should ask the girls if that's a problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe, like, brush your teeth, then work out, then eat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we go to a blacksmith to get some toothbrushes, possibly? I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you hear all this dragging of heels to get to the actual story? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meal is had, day is yours, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long was it going to take for the chalice to be made?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think she said a day or two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we should go talk to what's-his-butt? Shit, I've forgotten everything!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it time to liaise with Ludinus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About what? What would we say to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should go to the Bright Queen, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, on our time, we make our way to the Dynasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I think he had sent you to the Dynasty to check into this, and then return to him once you had informed him of what the decision was.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dude, add a couple months to that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get hit in the head a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's almost like a normal D&D game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were wasting two days of time here in Rexxentrum.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have something that I'm going to pick up at the store as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, should we go? Is it day three now? Should we go pick up these items?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, like, are they ready?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since the order was put in, it's been a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we go check in? Maybe they finish early and they just give that leeway time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you need more arrows made or anything? Are you all right on your bolts?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we going to tell the Bright Queen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, they're all stolen, aren't they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so, I did some crazy amount of research at the Cobalt Soul, and I looked into that Pride's Call thing, with the archeological dig where Trent was saying, yeah, that he dug up the thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, they actually did uncover another beacon at Pride's Call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so they're not telling the truth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that makes sense, because, yeah, Nott, you went up to the beacon and you took a look at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did it look different, did it look different?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he said it looked the same. He said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The handle work, I believe, on it looked different than the one that you were carrying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you said it was slightly smaller.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slightly smaller, but, like, overall, it had the same power, the same general shape.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She can probably tap into its energy and some shit, and sense from afar, and read it, and be like, "That's not it!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, or as soon as she tries to tap into it, it explodes and kills all of them and us included.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all our fear, yeah? We'll have to examine it quite carefully.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, from what I researched, the sinkhole at Pride's Call, it's from these old ruins from a pre-Calamity city called Shattengrad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's, like, a book over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bill S. Preston, I think, Ted Theodore Logan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is Dynasty side or over here? Over there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pride's Call is a dwarven city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- was dug up in an archeological dig?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Supposedly there had been two that were taken from the Dynasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them you returned, the other they're saying they're willing to return, and she's uncovered that there is a new one that has been recovered by a dig here on the Empire side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so Shattengrad, they were, like, super into arcane weaponry, and that's a lot of the stuff that they've uncovered in this archeological dig, and this was uncovered a couple weeks ago or something, isn't that what you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one that we were shown?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's now a third one: the one we recovered, the one that's missing, and now this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we don't know where the third one is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be in Pride Rock, whatever it's called. Pride's Call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, because they got the one from Pride's Call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will say, I was paying attention to that guy, and he was telling the truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trent Ikithon was telling the truth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was nothing idle about that guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So far, all of my research has told us that what Caduceus is saying is correct.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And there are three that we know of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's probably more, based on what I could recover that far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, the fact that one of them was recovered here, in the Empire, says something about the nature of these things, if they predate the Calamity, is what we have uncovered?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you've researched in the religion and the Luxon's presence, they predate the pantheon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not something that they, you know, forged or created, it's something that they--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And more are still being found.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like, maybe the earth grows them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I think we share, she probably looks at us like we're crazy, we tell her to believe us, and we go from there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We tell her about the one that was uncovered?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and then we probably get locked up, and then they let us out and are like, "Are you sure you're telling the truth?" We're like yes, and they lock us up again, and then they let us back out, and she's like, "Are you sure, have you had time to think about this?" And we're like, no, yeah, we're telling the truth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A question I have, I don't know the answer to yet, is whether we are going to be completely honest about that fact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord is saying, yeah, you mean to the Bright Queen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Fjord's saying-- you're talking about which part?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I would like to ease tensions, and part of me feels like the best thing to do is to be completely forthright with her, but that hardly seems like it would broker a peace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you're right. I don't even know if--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It might ingratiate us to her, but that does nothing for the conflict.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if they knew that Tharizdun was out there, the Chained Oblivion had, you know, shackles in the Empire, I'm sure there's one in the Dynasty and all these other places. I mean, we need to find a way to put petty shit, you know, continental shit, but petty shit aside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know that how this was presented to you is not because there hasn't been communication, but because of the relationship you have with the Bright Queen, the king believes that you might have a better chance of bringing it to a serious parley as opposed to just a conversation between emissaries.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Send in your seconds, see if they can set the record straight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of. I relay all that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing should be taken at face value.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it seem reasonable to, at the very least, air our-- I don't want to say concerns, necessarily-- but our just say what we know, say that we don't know if there's more that we don't know, but it's worth a cautious optimism?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We also need to get our hands on the delivery, and do our best to inspect it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think Trent would let us see it again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go steal it? We're going to go steal it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Nott can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what you're pulling out of all this? The most chaotic possible thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's what we do best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No lives taken, no holes in the floors, no things on fire, nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no, we're fine, we're good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll pick up the items here, we can also pick up your bracers in Xhorhas, we can talk to the Bright Queen, and then figure out next steps before your event is coming up, is it not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When did 3000 get involved? That's new, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not even in the one thousands here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 3000 is just so you guys know how cool it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's, like, a hype number.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That does make it sound so much more cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it the third Traveler Con, or like the 10th?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do you guys have Roman numerals?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As far as I know, I mean, this is the first time we've ever done this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, you know, I didn't even know that a lot of other people really knew about him, outside of me until we were traveling around and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me! I mean, yeah, I'm the most special follower they have.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, how big is the volcano? Because we have to fit inside of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I know the maximum, but what if we show up and there's only, like, eight people there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, there's definitely going to be at least eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not an active volcano that you have to be inside of, right? A dormant volcano is still all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know much about this volcano, specifically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But your patron has not given you a sense of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was just a person that gave you money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You thought he was patronizing you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, that could also, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought I was confused, now I'm really confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has not given you a sense of how many more? You know so many things through him, he gives you such fantastical abilities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has he imparted what to expect, or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said that-- no, he hasn't told me much about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he said he-- like, I helped him choose where it's going to be, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm basically his right-hand man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to show up, I mean, you're essentially the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously, which reminds me, I think I need to talk to Orly or something, because we need a boat there, a ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a normal ship, like the Balleater, or a larger ship?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's got to fit us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how the other people are going to get-- oh god, should I be organizing transportation for other people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he didn't tell you to do that, then no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my notebook and make a note to ask the Traveler later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has he given you a per diem? Or some sort of petty cash system? I feel like that would be useful as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if you don't know your duties, I mean, you might be responsible for decor, flowers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm definitely going to write a speech, just to be sure! Because I'm probably going to have to make--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lanyards, you know, like, special badges?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's so many things that I have to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sunday only, nobody wants those, but I mean.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happens at a Con 3000? Do people come and speak or do special things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: People come, and they'll probably, they'll be like, "Oh my god, Jester, "we've heard so much about you, "because Traveler talks about you all the time and stuff," so they'll probably be really excited.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it like, food and events?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we all will get together, and then we'll be like, "Oh my god, "let's all talk about how great the Traveler is!" And outside of that, I don't really know what to expect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if they bring weapons? Do they get the little orange markers on them to show that, you know, they're not dangerous, or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, zip tie them to the people's belts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I should get some zip ties.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So many, I should really talk to the Traveler about all of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe it's a leap of faith he's expecting you to take.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe you should make a performance with your bone flute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I could do that. I was saving that for something else, but we could--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should practice together and then we could do it together!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's going to be a harp, so that'll be okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think we should practice a song together, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to get a piano there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to get a piano into a volcano?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I can paint a piano as soon as we get to the volcano!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, like, paint it and it will appear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Able to conjure up a lollipop; can you make a piano?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This'll be the first performance of Yasha and the Orphan Makers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you guys could play Jester out as she comes out to do her keynote speech.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, we could, you know, give you, what do they call those? Barking?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, like when someone is coming into a room and you say--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can play a song for you to come into the room to meet the Traveler and everyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got really distracted from our plans of saving the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon, and I'm going to conjure a piano.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you focus, what level you cast it as?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This pinkish energy swirls and sparkles into this little toy piano, that (plinking) in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not the best sound, it's not tuned well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That and the skull whistle's going to be a fucking thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know, as opposed to being a nightmarish discordant toy piano being tussled with by a kid in the back of the antique store, it's more like your cute pixie manic girl on YouTube who decided, "Eh, not an uke today, toy piano." (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It looks like there are buttons, too, for, like, drum beats or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know we got sidetracked, but do you have like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, do you have a goal, or a hope, a wish, coming out of this, that you'll--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All I know is that he told me to be there, so I got to be there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a holy man now, Fjord, you understand that when your god asks you to go somewhere and do something for them--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as they're not a giant sea snake that's asking you to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we don't even know if it was a snea snake, all right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is a snea sake different from a sea snake?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is, yeah. One is venomous, one is not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little bit like a snea stack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the other one has a sneeze on his face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was this morning, or are we still talking in the hall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Imagine all that, but like, half-chewed food in half of the words.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're waiting for a chalice, we're waiting for a harp before we leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got to waste a fucking day again, so what are we doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go talk to the Bright Queen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't. We have to wait a day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can say the day goes by.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless we want to do anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The only place that we could possibly go is to visit Astrid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or go to Pride's Rock and see what's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's why we were taking the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if he's got a circle to go to Pride's Call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can do all sorts of things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to Pride's Call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he can't teleport us to a random place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, a day will go by.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, I could go back to the library, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Da'leth is not, I don't think, going to send us to go sniffing about where they found one of these things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if that's why they all look different?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would not want to pass one of those stones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but gods are really big.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One day they had, like, a lot of meat, the other day, lots of veggies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or, like, one is from, you know, like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One day there were on a protein kick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One is from Kord, and the little one is from Ioun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: DM, when I went up to the last one, were there little bits of corn in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not see any mark on the back of his neck, but--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 plus five! Ooh, I'm so insightful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh dude, I just realized what your shirt is, it's awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Eat it, eat it!" Oh my god, Jester, Sprinkle's dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could see down the hall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's been dead since the Underdark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, it is curious, "if this is the assumption "that perhaps this Obann figure had him under his control, "there would be this mark, you say? "Since it's not there, it's a possibility "that either it was removed, or perhaps there was "other magic involved in erasing a trace."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Was the mark forcefully removed from you or anything?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Certainly explains a few things though, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does not seem to be in a physical state "for future interrogation, necessarily, "and time draws short with the Bright Queen, "so if we are to make our cause there, "we should definitely get on our way to the Bastion."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to talk to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While we would walk to the Bright Queen, because I want to keep this going, have we scryed on Vence here lately?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I can try it, but it would be really, really hard to scry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's got something to block it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got a thing, like, he's got.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So he is either off the grid, or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't like, sometimes work and sometimes doesn't?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am a bit compromised because you are all not protected like I am, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we always stay a little bit away from you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could scry on Darrow to see who his client is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was thinking about that, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, because he's like, not going to tell us, we could just find out on our own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't fuck that guy, I mean, fuck him if Fjord doesn't like him, but he's pretty nice, I thought he was funny.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How long was he down there? In the prison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you hear, roughly two days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably a little longer than that, because of travel and everything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you feel, being locked up for so long?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Changed man. Forgot what the sky looked like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so are you stopping to scry on anybody, or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to do it, like, now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just get to the Bright Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Led within, some of the guards give some odd looks, recognizing (chuckling) your arrival not long ago in very different attire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we look the same, just Fjord, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, not all of you got Seeming immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made it a little ways through the Lucid Bastion before the Seeming was applied.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then changed, for some reason.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of you make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not my best, but that's okay, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the the same crest of horns, but as supposed to a crown, it's a little more of a helmet with sides that curl out a bit, and she looks like she is a little more stepping towards a battle-ready persona.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should take care of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, probably. Do you want us to talk about--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. I'm not even from-- well, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We toppled some of our quarry, and have uncovered a bit more about your previous inquiries, beacons, the Empire's involvement, their knowledge of your Luxon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you confirmed this with your eyes, then?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've confirmed that it is not within the city of Rexxentrum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek immediately takes her gaze, and Essek goes, "My queen, we have, as you know, "arrested one of our higher dens." He makes a gesture towards one of the empty chairs within the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That reckoning will be something to deal with."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Essek, tell-- may I speak, your majesty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Angel of Irons cult is well known for mind control. It's one of the tools that they use the most within their ranks, and we have reason to believe that some of the people that were doing deeds for them didn't even do it by their own fruition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then, pray tell, who is this individual "who might have been responsible for influencing "the mind of one of our great leaders here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, there was a man working named Obann, who was a very high up-- I think he was a devil?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it's possible, he may have come across your Taskhand and done the same to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have reason to believe that your ally was at least under some sort of mind influence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you had been seeking this Obann, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a really bad, bad guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And how close are you to bringing him to justice?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are happy to report that Obann has been dealt with, quite handily. He has failed at his task and has not only been punished by us, but also the god that he serves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Including some of those that he had control over breaking free, turning on him, and helping us to destroy him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And these individuals that have been broken free, "they renounce the things they've done?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know anyone who didn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But hopefully "mercy can be considered." She looks about. "Very well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a another issue to be reported.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we have a further development you will be interested to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as the Bright Queen) "Then please, share it with us."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They would like to return it to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I beg of you to see the greater threat to this world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to say it's cocked, but it's mostly that, so it's low.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a low cock, it's nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have any idea what they wish "in return for this beacon?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think both of you have that in common at the moment, of how this cult has manipulated events.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I believe we've mentioned him to you in the past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, while we are uncertain how deep that hole goes, "the treachery runs to the top within the Empire as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think now's the time to talk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always interesting when it's something that two peoples have in common.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "And where would you like this mediation to take place?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were thinking at sea, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A neutral place, away from both the Empire and the Dynasty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's wonderful this time of year.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The lagoon and Nicodranas, you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just somewhere on the Menagerie Coast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, this isn't the Menagerie Coast map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We assume that you would not go in person, your highness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have means of communicating, "and I am certain the higher royalty in the king's court "have such artifacts also at their availability."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we'd be bringing a few artifacts out onto a boat, and the artifacts would sort of talk to each other?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some people? Or would it just be the the artifacts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The beacon is to be brought as well to be transferred "upon agreement only."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can have the meeting aboard our ship, if we have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we have a really nice one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a war ship, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will bring our prisoner, "this traitor, "and should they catch this Vence, they bring theirs."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe somewhere in between, we could learn something."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what if they do not find Vence? Or is that a non-negotiable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And while I appreciate what you've brought here, "and the information you've provided, "you will not be necessary at this negotiation."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's sort of our thing that we--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm afraid we are tasked to see this to the end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should not be unsure about ours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you get an assist from Fjord on that, so you have advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a natural one on the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not see you sellswords and adventuring types "interested in the details of political negotiation, "but if that is your prerogative."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We mean to lend an air of accountability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our objective is our own, and always has been, as Mr. Widogast has just previously stated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The soul of the Empire is at stake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If anything, all of the information that has gleamed in the past several weeks has proved what we tried to warn months ago, that this war was staged by greater forces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you prefer a specific date, or should we leave it vague for security reasons for now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Essek, you have means--" Essek goes, "I can communicate with them while they're on the road, "and they have one who is eager to communicate "regardless of the circumstances."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When is your prisoner planned to be put on trial?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And can you promise to maintain the ceasefire until these talks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But if I hear word of any Kryn lives lost, "any waste folks slain until this date, "we commence."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We thank you for your patience.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know how to reanimate a dead weasel? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give it life from your beacon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once you pass by the antechamber doors, closing behind, even Essek's like (exhales).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like, even by the standard-- I mean like, I know that we set the bar, like, a very-- I don't like saying it that often, but like, wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We normally fuck things up pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For, like, a normal bar, that was pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I had a feeling that you would be the one to push us over the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would not have had as much sway here without your assistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you need a lift back to your home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh, no, no, we can do that, we're actually okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, I just assumed, It's been a--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've done so much for us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, Yasha's got some shopping we should pick up before we go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but what time is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We probably have to get it tomorrow morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, we'll go sleep at the house, and then we'll head back, is that okay? I can send a message along that we've had talks, and that, you know, we will be arriving tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should do that and reassure the ceasefire and make sure that no one attacks anybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who should I send a message to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, I should send them a message tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If anyone kills a Kryn soldier, we're fucked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, all right, all right, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is a good idea. Let him know--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, while we're walking, I'm going to send him a message.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was good, I don't care if everything goes to heck tomorrow, today was good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we rested yesterday, because we went to the spa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I assume we expect your arrival soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done, expect your arrival soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh thanks, shit, what'd he say? (Matt chuckling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep the ceasefire, super important. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was counting for it so I wasn't listening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way back towards the Xhorhaus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bye, Essek! You can come by tonight and get some dinner or something, if you want to. We miss you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't done any shopping or anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's pretty empty in there, I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just hope it sticks." And he drifts off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wonder what work he has to do so late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I don't know, I mean, maybe he's got to go torture that guy some more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who knows what the Shadowhand really does, I mean, that's probably--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're in your private space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think he's a family man? Think he has kids?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we ever asked him about himself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have we been to his house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a stupid question, nobody knows that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does he have a significant other or anything like that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we asked if he was single.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and he was like ooh, I'm aloof, I'm Essek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I call him and ask him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, you should send him a message right now, he hasn't even gotten that far.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If he just actually had to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, you know you have to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to send him a message.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should really hang out more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you single? Do you have kids?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He says he's not very interesting, but we know that's a lie.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, anybody who says that is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't answer my questions at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what are we supposed to do tonight? Night in Xhorhas, Xhorhaus, Xhorhas.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I don't know, you just never know for sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try to get better, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good point, we haven't heard the bone harp and the bone flute together.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we give it a go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe, you know, we can make a cocktail, do a little like, you guys do a little jam sesh for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep Spiritual Weapon up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could practice, you know, for your entrance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to put a fire on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go get the booze!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Essek seemed okay with you today, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you guys hugging as you're having this conversation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're in private and we're spooning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, our anuses are focused on the sun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no sun here. We can't do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Create Undead on the weasel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been a while since we've seen Essek, and so I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just seemed a little funky back there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you think-- I have-- I'm a little bit worried.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think it would be a terrible idea, because many of my ideas are, if I asked Jester to scry on that prisoner?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But maybe we are assholes, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They must think you are fucking god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She did not look that impressed with me, to be honest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, do you have any cotton?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you shove some in my ears?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's-- I found it under the sink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spiritual Weapon! (crappy beatboxing) (laughter) (Sam vocalizing) (Travis vocalizing) (Laura vocalizing) (Taliesin shouting) (laughter) (Liam cat yowling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this all, by the way, that it can do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, it is a flute in the sense that it has-- there are means you're learning as you're finding it, there are certain places where you can change the key, but the sound is pretty consistent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always going to be a scream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Taliesin shouting) (laughter) I'd like you all to make performance checks, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poor Frumpkin is meowing really loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't do this anymore, I don't think, but every now and then, there would be, like, a day of school in elementary school where they would pass out recorders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a grand orchestra of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Echoing throughout the Xhorhaus, peacefully quiet, dark and empty in this little nestled neighborhood in the Gallimaufry district of Rosohna, as we pull back through the windows of the interior soft glow, the lit tree that looms over the house above the entirety of the neighborhood, the epic, muffled, but ever-grating sound of cacophonous, can't even really call it music, emanating through the streets as neighbors walk through the night road, going--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's when the music teacher brings out his special thermos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to pick this up next Thursday.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to meet the Tal'Dorei Council and Jester's going to step forward and say, "I have brought you a most special arrow." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I haven't seen you break on camera like that in a long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't remember the last time I broke on camera like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I couldn't shake it for a while.
